statements: SELECT * FROM learning_tracking WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, module_id FROM learning_tracking WHERE time_spent_minutes > 30 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT module_id, time_spent_minutes FROM learning_tracking WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY time_spent_minutes DESC;
SELECT student_id, module_id, time_spent_minutes FROM learning_tracking WHERE module_id IN (1, 3) ORDER BY student_id ASC, module_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM learning_tracking ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM learning_tracking WHERE student_id = 1 AND time_spent_minutes > 30 ORDER BY time_spent_minutes DESC;
SELECT student_id, module_id, SUM(time_spent_minutes) AS total_time_spent FROM learning_tracking GROUP BY student_id, module_id ORDER BY total_time_spent DESC;
SELECT student_id, module_id, time_spent_minutes FROM learning_tracking WHERE time_spent_minutes BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM learning_tracking WHERE student_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM learning_tracking WHERE module_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_id, module_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM module_time_tracking;
SELECT module_id, module_name FROM learning_modules ORDER BY module_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, module_id, time_spent FROM module_time_tracking WHERE time_spent > 5;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM learning_modules WHERE module_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(time_spent) AS average_time_spent FROM module_time_tracking;
SELECT * FROM module_time_tracking WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM learning_modules WHERE module_id = 3
SELECT student_id, module_id FROM module_time_tracking WHERE time_spent > 5 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM learning_modules WHERE module_name LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY module_id ASC
SELECT student_id, SUM(time_spent) AS total_time_spent FROM module_time_tracking GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_time_spent > 10 ORDER BY total_time_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM time_spent;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM modules;
SELECT module_id, module_name FROM modules WHERE module_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM modules WHERE module_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, email, module_name, time_spent_in_seconds FROM students s JOIN time_spent t ON s.student_id = t.student_id JOIN modules m ON t.module_id = m.module_id;
SELECT student_name, module_name, time_spent_in_seconds FROM students s JOIN time_spent t ON s.student_id = t.student_id JOIN modules m ON t.module_id = m.module_id WHERE student_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM modules;
SELECT module_name, time_spent_minutes FROM modules WHERE time_spent_minutes > 30;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE time_started < '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_duration_minutes FROM learning_activities ORDER BY activity_duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name='John Doe';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id=1;
SELECT module_name, time_spent_minutes FROM modules ORDER BY time_spent_minutes DESC;

SELECT student_name, module_name, activity_name FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id JOIN modules ON student_progress.module_id = modules.module_id JOIN learning_activities ON learning_activities.module_id = modules.module_id;
SELECT student_name, time_started, time_completed FROM students JOIN student_progress ON students.student_id = student_progress.student_id WHERE time_completed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM student_module_progress;
SELECT student_name FROM student ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT module_id, module_name FROM module WHERE module_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_id, SUM(time_spent_hrs) AS total_hours_spent FROM module_time_spent GROUP BY student_id;

SELECT student.student_name, module.module_name, module_access_logs.accessed_at FROM student JOIN module_access_logs ON student.student_id = module_access_logs.student_id JOIN module ON module_access_logs.module_id = module.module_id;
SELECT * FROM module_time_spent ORDER BY time_spent_hrs DESC;
SELECT student_name, module_name, progress_percentage FROM student s JOIN student_module_progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id LEFT JOIN module m ON p.module_id = m.module_id;

SELECT s.student_name, m.module_name, p.progress_percentage, t.time_spent_hrs FROM student s JOIN student_module_progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id JOIN module m ON p.module_id = m.module_id LEFT JOIN module_time_spent t ON s.student_id = t.student_id AND m.module_id = t.module_id;

SELECT student_name, module_name, progress_percentage, accessed_at FROM student s JOIN student_module_progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id JOIN module m ON p.module_id = m.module_id LEFT JOIN module_access_logs l ON s.student_id = l.student_id AND m.module_id = l.module_id ORDER BY accessed_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(s.student_id) AS total_students, AVG(t.time_spent_hrs) AS average_time_spent FROM student s JOIN module_time_spent t ON s.student_id = t.student_id;
